GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
drm/v3d: Fix null pointer dereference of pointer perfmon

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit 3b72deb784a7d4ae8519a5c584cd87c4b57aa6c8, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 26a4dc29b74a137f45665089f6d3d633fcc9b662. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/v3d: Fix null pointer dereference of pointer perfmon
